articles.author: Thomas Jones, Kirk Bohls
articles.title: Texas hires Rodney Terry as full-time men's basketball coach on five-year, $15.3M contract - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: The former assistant to Chris Beard guided the Longhorns to the Elite Eight while working as interim head coach
articles.content: After a month of speculation that seemed to heighten in intensity with each NCAA Tournament victory, the University of Texas finally removed the interim label from mens basketball coach Rodney Terry'… [+4687 chars]
